snippet: A review of federal data found that technology investments in schools had not changed the nature of education.
abstract: Review of federal data by nonprofit Center for American Progress finds that technology investments in schools has not changed the nature of education; finds no state is collecting data to evaluate whether investments are actually improving student achievement.
lead_paragraph: A review of federal data found that technology investments in schools had not changed the nature of education.

headline.main: Study Gauges Value of Technology in Schools
headline.print_headline: Study Gauges Value of Technology in Schools
